title: Where does steel go
brief_description: Shows how steel is made into a variety of products at the Newcastle works of Ryland Bros., Stewarts and Lloyds, and other films. Among the products shows in process of manufacture are wire, steel fence posts, wire rope, steel pipes, corrugated iron and steel wheels for rolling stock.
